Name: Lovers_paradise
Title: Leh --- the land of stupas, gompas and llamas
Review: This is basically a big welcome entrance gate to Leh city. All tourists and travellers to this city gets a grand welcome. From here the Leh iMain Market is just a short walk away. The bus terminus is also nearby. You will notice this place first thing when you enter Leh city either from Manali side or from Srinagar side.

Name: SaddviAndalwala
Title: Just an ordinary Stupa
Review: This Buddhist stupa is just an ordinary piece of rock with some carvings of sermons on it. The number of tourists visiting this area is also very less.

Name: Peregrineri
Title: Beautiful Stupa
Review: This is a lovely stupa that sits right in the middle of the intersection of the two highways as you approach Leh town. Definitely worth a photo if you can approach it safely.
